charaepi_ch0089_00_n/2301_1101_0100_20:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was taking a leisurely
stroll on the shoreline...
charaepi_ch0089_00_n/2301_1201_0300_10:
Nature on Pasio was created with a 
perfect formula.
charaepi_ch0089_00_n/2301_1201_0400_10:
It’s a utopia—the perfect fusion of black and
white, of nature and humanity...
charaepi_ch0089_00_n/2301_0401_0600_10:
The sync pairs who have gathered here are
also ideal.
charaepi_ch0089_00_n/2301_0402_0800_10:
The sync pairs gathered here on Pasio are
also ideal.
charaepi_ch0089_00_n/2301_1201_0900_10:
Here, Trainers let their partner Pokémon out of
their Poké Balls to walk beside them.
charaepi_ch0089_00_n/2301_1201_1000_10:
Of course, they’re still reliant on Poké Balls
sometimes...
charaepi_ch0089_00_n/2301_1201_1100_10:
But this is the ideal relationship between humans
and Pokémon that I have always pursued.
charaepi_ch0089_00_n/2301_1201_1200_10:
This is the perfect case study for making my ideals
a reality...
charaepi_ch0089_00_n/2301_1201_1300_10:
A very valuable case study indeed...and so close
to my ideals.
charaepi_ch0089_00_n/2301_1201_1400_10:
I have finally found hope after leaving on my
journey so long ago.
charaepi_ch0089_00_n/2301_1201_1500_10:
It’s like I’m in a dream... Don’t you feel the
same way?
charaepi_ch0089_00_n/2301_0401_1700_10: I suppose you haven’t realized it yet.
charaepi_ch0089_00_n/2301_0402_1900_10: I suppose you haven’t realized it yet.
charaepi_ch0089_00_n/2301_1201_2000_10:
Trainers and their Pokémon are bound by a strong
mutual trust in each other. I feel this way of
coexisting can bring my ideals closer to reality.
charaepi_ch0089_00_n/2301_1201_2100_10:
Since the day I started my journey, I’ve been
traveling with my Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0089_00_n/2301_1201_2200_10:
I can hear the voices of my friends and
understand their emotions...
charaepi_ch0089_00_n/2301_1201_2300_10:
But when we find something beautiful, or when
we’re battling together...
charaepi_ch0089_00_n/2301_1201_2400_10:
I don’t hear them anymore—because our thoughts
are one and the same.
charaepi_ch0089_00_n/2301_1201_2500_10:
When Zekrom and I met, it was like destiny. I’ve
felt that kind of special connection between us
many times.
charaepi_ch0089_00_n/2301_1201_2600_10: I suppose that’s what a bond is.
charaepi_ch0089_00_n/2301_0401_2800_10:
Yes. There were so many things I didn’t see, all
because I could hear my friends’ voices...
charaepi_ch0089_00_n/2301_0402_3000_10:
Yes. There were so many things I didn’t see, all
because I could hear my friends’ voices...
charaepi_ch0089_00_n/2301_1201_3100_10:
Many people—including you—have created
bonds here on Pasio that transcend ideologies
and species...
charaepi_ch0089_00_n/2301_1201_3300_10:
Seeing that, I’ve started to feel that the ideals
of that Trainer back in Unova weren’t just a 
faraway dream...
charaepi_ch0089_00_n/2301_1201_3400_10:
However, not everyone is joined in heart and soul
the way Trainers and Pokémon on Pasio are.
charaepi_ch0089_00_n/2301_1201_3500_10: Black and white are still not fully united...
charaepi_ch0089_00_n/2301_1201_3600_10: That’s why I’ll continue my journey eventually.
charaepi_ch0089_00_n/2301_1201_3800_10:
I think I’ll stay here a while longer and keep living
this dream. That wouldn’t be so bad, would it?
